statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '12345';
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE is_read = false;
SELECT notification_id, order_id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT notifications.message, orders.order_date FROM notifications JOIN orders ON notifications.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE notifications.notification_type = 'Shipping' ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC;
SELECT order_date, status FROM orders WHERE status IN ('Delivered', 'Cancelled') AND order_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT COUNT(*), status FROM orders GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, status, customer_name FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT order_id, message FROM notifications WHERE order_id = 101
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN notifications ON orders.order_id = notifications.order_id
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price from Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT notification_type, message, notification_date FROM OrderNotifications WHERE notification_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT notification_type, message FROM OrderNotifications WHERE notification_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN Products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id ORDER BY o.order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM Orders INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_name = Customers.customer_name;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM Orders JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id JOIN Products ON OrderItems.product_id = Products.product_id;
